instruction: How were the machine learning algorithms used in the research on achieving classification and concentration detection of cancer biomarkers using a combination of terahertz (THz) spectroscopy, metasurface sensors, and machine learning?

For the time-domain spectrum, the random forest algorithm was employed. On the other hand, for the frequency-domain spectrum, the support vector machine (SVM) algorithm was used. The frequency-domain spectra were obtained by processing the time-domain spectra through noise reduction and fast Fourier transform. The SVM algorithm performed better in classifying the biomarkers in the frequency-domain spectrum, achieving an accuracy of 0.989.
